name: Tickball
description:
Tickball is played with a ball and two teams, each consisting of 5 players.
Your goal is to make 5 goals, but to win the game, your score must be at least 2 more than the score of the enemy.

More info in the game (press F1 at any time).

By Jan De Bruyn (jandebruyn@pandora.be)
and Nickliff (nickliff@hotmail.com)

This game is freeware and can be distributed as long as nothing is
changed in any way. This game is made with Game Maker (by Mark
Overmars).
Suggestions / comments etc. are welcome.

HAVE FUN! :D
